entry.title: FROST ADVISORY, Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 a.m. EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
